#summary How to translate raptor.
#labels Phase-Implementation,Phase-Deploy

== Translate Raptor==

It's easy to translate raptor using the Qt Linguist tools

 # Edit the src.pro build file and add to the translation list as shown below.
{{{
TRANSLATIONS = translations/raptor_fr.ts translations/raptor_{new_language}.ts
}}}
 # Use the lupdate tool on the src.pro file to generate/update the translation file `*`.ts
{{{
lupdate src.pro
}}}
 # Launch the linguist tool and translate the `*`.ts file
{{{
linguist raptor_{new_language}.ts
}}}
 # Once the translation is done, compile the .ts file to a .qm file
{{{
lrelease raptor_{new_language}.ts
}}}

==Use the new translation file==
Just copy the translation .qm file to the raptor translation path.
Launch raptor. In the settings window, you can now select the new language. You'll have to restart raptor to have it translated.
